### Request for Proposal: Aircraft Tires

**Tender ID**: cb-5763-39557021

**Amendment ID**: 2

**Government Contracting Entity**: DGAEPM

**Address**: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada

**Contact Information**:

* **Name**: Dany Lebel
* **Email**: dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca
* **Phone**: (000) 000-0000

**Tender Description**

The Department of National Defence invites proposals for the supply of aircraft tires, as identified by the following UN/SPSC codes:

* UNSPC: 25202205
* Description: Aircraft tires

The scope of supply includes:

* Part number: 461B-3197-TL
* Quantity: 200
* Delivery location: CFSD Montreal, Canada
* Delivery date: 25th October 2023

Bidders are required to submit their proposals electronically using the epost Connect service. Submissions may also be sent by mail or courier to the designated address.

**Trade Agreements**

This tender is subject to various trade agreements, including:

* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

**Bidder Instructions**

To be considered, bids must be submitted electronically through the epost Connect service or delivered by mail or courier to the designated address. Bidders proposing equivalent or substitute products must indicate the brand name and model, and/or part number and NCAGE.

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**Submission Deadline**

The tender closing date and time is 14:00:00 on 22nd June 2023.

**Languages**

Submissions may be presented in either official language of Canada: English or French.

**Attachments**

Tender documents, bid solicitations, and other relevant documentation are available online.

* [English version](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5763
